thread.title: Lululemon Gets a Boost From E-Commerce

author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Lululemon Gets a Boost From E-Commerce
text:
This time last year, Lululemonlooked troubled: Traffic to stores had dropped and the yoga-wear maker said it expected same-store sales to fall. Athleisure, the trend of wearing workout clothes in nonworkout settings, seemed on the way out. The stock fell 24%.
But what a difference a year can make.

Shares rebounded through 2017. In January,...
